# NPC
A minecraft NPC plugin

How to use it :

```
name: assaut

display_name:
  - '$npc.assaut.name_A'
  - '$npc.assaut.name_B'
  - '$npc.assaut.name_C'
  
location:
  x: -273.537
  y: 56.0
  z: 191.493
  yaw: -112.8
  pitch: 5.8
  world: world
  
use-player-skin: false

equipement:
  - '0;DIAMOND_AXE'

authorize-interact:
  - 'INTERACT_AT'

#value: ""
#signature: ""
value: ""
signature: ""
```
